title: Parallax Design Testing
description: Testing parallax scrolling effects with images and content - exploring how visual depth can enhance the reading experience.

title: Backdoors Overlooked
description: The backdoors that are often overlooked are usually the most obvious ones - the patterns we dismiss because they seem too simple or too direct.

title: Growth Engineering Systems
description: Growth engineering isn't just about metrics - it's about building systems that make the right behaviors feel natural and inevitable.

title: Interfaces as Extensions of Thought
description: The best interfaces don't feel like interfaces at all. They feel like extensions of thought.
